transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir Abhishek baat kar raha hu. 
Customer: Boliye sir boliye. 
Executive: Sir sir aapko koi abhi koi concern raise hua tha ye TRK Priya Mandi karke jiska paid amount tha 1028 rupees.
Customer: 1028 rupees?
Executive: Haan kisi ne complaint ki thi matlab amount usne de diya tha aapko aur aapne product deliver nahi kiya tha.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa to kuch hua hi nahi sir kya naam hai unka?
Executive: TRK TRK Priya Mandi Mandasur karke koi tha. Abhi 2 November ki ye baat hai to isme aapka ek concern raise hua tha sir.
Customer: Nahi verify karo na aap uske andar usko bolo ki screenshot bhejiye ye bhejiye aisa to maine kabhi liya hi nahi.
Executive: Sir product name tha NTRN gel in disputed amount tha 1028. Mode of payment tha. Screenshot mangao bolna jisko payment kiya kya kiya wo verify karo aap.
Customer: Apna to nahi hua sir.
Customer: Apne yaha se to nahi hua. Apna number match karo do uska number match karo.
Executive: Hua kya tha sir ye ticket open hua tha theek hai ye aapka ticket mujhe seller ka pata chahiye. Ye ye jo concern tha Arif ke naam se tha theek hai Arif ke naam se.
Customer: Haan
Executive: Kya naam se?
Customer: Arif naam hai Aarushi naam Aarushi Singh replied.
Customer: Nahi sir nahi apna nahi hai sir wo.
Executive: To sir ye jo concern raise hua 2 number ye ho to gaya theek hai par mai keh raha hu ki jaise sir aap kisi se payment vagera lete hai to kuch time vagera de diya kariye ki itne time me aapko amount agar aapka receive hua na usse to itne time me product deliver ho payega. Ye ticket vagera open kar dete hai na buyer vagera to isse aapki profile kharab hoti hai. To jo is abhi aapka ek buyer education ka bhi ticket khula hai to wo mai close clear kar de raha hu abhi. Buyer feed full ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur baad baki sir buyleads vagera kaise aa rahe hai aapko abhi service kaise chal rahi hai. Haan buyleads abhi thoda kam hai sir bahut kam hai. Buyleads matlab lead management.
Customer: Hmm hmm bataiye lead management kya?
Customer: Pehle uska pehle mai bahar gaya tha gaav gaya tha to jyada kar nahi paya tha to aapne mujhe phone kiya tha ki aapka jo account hai activate nahi hai barabar. To mai sab video vagera sab clear kar dijiye. Buyleads bhi liya tha sab liya tha lo to abhi mujhe samjho ek din ka samjho 5 6 7 8 aisa matlab inquiry aana chahiye utna nahi aata abhi ek do pehle ek ya do ek ek sirf ek hi aaya tha mujhe buyleads me ek aadha daily ka barabar.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Chahiye sir response nahi aa raha sir uske andar jaisa response chahiye waisa response nahi aaya.
Executive: Abhi jaise abhi sir abhi kitna time hua aapko?
Customer: Ek mahina ho gaya na sir.
Executive: Ek mahina ho gaya sir hum ye keh rahe hai haan abhi jaise kya dekh raha hu ki aapke paas sabse jyada jo inquiry aur buyleads show ho rahi hai ye Ram Darbar coin ki ho rahi hai theek hai fir uske baad me ye NTRN gel ki aur NTRN chemical ki abhi aayi hai Rajasthan se ek Mumbai Maharashtra se to aap Mumbai me hi deal karte ho na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan to abhi Mumbai ki do teen padi hai buyleads NTRN chemical ki aur baad baki mai dekh raha hu past week me sir aapki jo buyleads aati hai na NTRN gel ki ye expire bahut jaldi ho jati hai to thoda active rehna padega sir platform pe.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai chalo mai active rahunga koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Haan aur sir ye jaise ki iska iska thoda dhyan rakhiye jaise aapka kya rehta hai buyleads consume ka time kitne time aap matlab open karke dekhte hai.
Customer: Abhi sir aapne jabse mujhe phone kiya tabhi se mai on hi rehta hu mai thodi thodi aadhe ghante ke baad aadhe ghante ke baad ek ghante ke baad open karke dekhta hu.
Executive: Sir ek kaam kariye ek jaise ki thoda apna timing change kar dijiye jaise aap khana kha peena raat me jaise aap late nahi jaate 15 minute mobile chalate honge to thoda raat me thoda dekh lijiye kyuki raat me bahut sari bahut sare log free hote hai aur buyleads post karte hai aur aapka jo product line hai na wo thoda competition jyada hai to jaise buyleads post hoti hai na waise consume ho gayi sold out ho jati hai. Mai dekh raha hu ki aapke account me na sold out bahut sari buyleads padi hai jo aapko dikhi nahi hongi wo sold out ho gayi hai aur achi khasi quantity me buyleads hai ek se 2 lakh ki dekh rahe hai na ek se do do lakh ki buyleads hai 50 lakh se 1 crore ki ye padi hai maine dekha 10 se 20 lakh ki coin ki bhi hai aur NTRN gel ki bhi hai to thoda timing bhi change kar lo ek baar raat me check kar liya na sote time ek baar subah jaldi morning me check kar liya aise karenge na to thoda ye aapke pattern change ho jayega buyleads consume karne ka aur thoda isse
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a concern about non-delivery.

- Customer is receiving fewer buyleads than expected.

- Buyleads for NTRN gel expire quickly.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the concern was not from the customer.

- Executive closed the buyer education ticket.

- Executive suggested setting a delivery timeframe after payment.

- Executive advised checking buyleads at night.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, delivery, payment, concern, timing
